products.title: Bexley Zinc 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Bexley zinc 89mm vertical blind in grey. Made to measure from 16.00 with free uk mainland delivery. This 89mm vertical blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Introduce sutble shantung style weave fabrics into your interior styling with their contemporary bexley range.
 
 Product id: sdb-vtb1402 fabric colour: zinc material: 100% polyester headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable   slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Bexley Zinc
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure bexley zinc standard vertical blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality standard vertical blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm
 	min drop: 300mm max drop: 2913mm
 	fabric composition: polyester
 	louvre width: 89mm
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	fittings: included
 	controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: a choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
